itemLabel: Peter Brooke, Baron Brooke of Sutton Mandeville

wikipedia_page.main: Peter Leonard Brooke, Baron Brooke of Sutton Mandeville,  (born 3 March 1934) is a British politician. A member of the Conservative Party, he served in the Cabinet under Prime Ministers Margaret Thatcher and John Major, and was a Member of Parliament (MP) representing the Cities of London and Westminster from 1977 to 2001.

response: *1934 – Peter Brooke, Baron Brooke of Sutton Mandeville, English politician, Secretary of State for Northern Ireland
